title: Add oscillate Stream Evaluator to support sine wave analysis
description:
The oscillate function predicts control points of a sine wave given amplitude, angular frequency and phase parameters. 

As part of this ticket the work on the harmonicFit Stream Evaluator will also be finished to support sine wave curve fitting and extrapolation. 

Implementations for oscillate and harmonicFit provided by Apache Commons Math

comments.content: Initial patch with working implementations. Tests to follow.
